content:
Craft an item of type: stone_axe
inventory=[{"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 4, "index": 14}, {"type": "oak_wood", "quantity": 26, "index": 20}, {"type": "creeper_spawn_egg", "quantity": 2, "index": 22}, {"type": "cracked_polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 51, "index": 28}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 3, "index": 39}, {"type": "magenta_banner", "quantity": 13, "index": 41}]
thought: To craft a stone axe I need 2 sticks and some stone. I have 4 bamboo which can be crafted into sticks, so I will start by moving one piece of bamboo into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: stone_axe
inventory=[{"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 3, "index": 14}, {"type": "oak_wood", "quantity": 26, "index": 20}, {"type": "creeper_spawn_egg", "quantity": 2, "index": 22}, {"type": "cracked_polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 51, "index": 28}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 3, "index": 39}, {"type": "magenta_banner", "quantity": 13, "index": 41}]
thought: The first piece of bamboo has been placed in the crafting grid, now I will move the second piece into the crafting grid as well.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: stone_axe
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 2, "index": 14}, {"type": "oak_wood", "quantity": 26, "index": 20}, {"type": "creeper_spawn_egg", "quantity": 2, "index": 22}, {"type": "cracked_polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 51, "index": 28}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 3, "index": 39}, {"type": "magenta_banner", "quantity": 13, "index": 41}]
thought: I have crafted the first stick, now I will move it to my inventory so that I can use it later.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: stone_axe
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 2, "index": 14}, {"type": "oak_wood", "quantity": 26, "index": 20}, {"type": "creeper_spawn_egg", "quantity": 2, "index": 22}, {"type": "cracked_polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 51, "index": 28}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 3, "index": 39}, {"type": "magenta_banner", "quantity": 13, "index": 41}]
thought: To craft a stone_axe, I need to craft sticks. I have some bamboo in slot 14 which I can use to craft sticks. Therefore, I will move one bamboo from slot 14 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: stone_axe
inventory=[{"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "oak_wood", "quantity": 26, "index": 20}, {"type": "creeper_spawn_egg", "quantity": 2, "index": 22}, {"type": "cracked_polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 51, "index": 28}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 3, "index": 39}, {"type": "magenta_banner", "quantity": 13, "index": 41}]
thought: The bamboo is already in slot 1. I will move another bamboo into slot 4 since it is directly below slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: stone_axe
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "oak_wood", "quantity": 26, "index": 20}, {"type": "creeper_spawn_egg", "quantity": 2, "index": 22}, {"type": "cracked_polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 51, "index": 28}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 3, "index": 39}, {"type": "magenta_banner", "quantity": 13, "index": 41}]
thought: I have crafted a stick. I will move it out of the crafting grid into a free slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: stone_axe
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "oak_wood", "quantity": 26, "index": 20}, {"type": "creeper_spawn_egg", "quantity": 2, "index": 22}, {"type": "cracked_polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 51, "index": 28}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 3, "index": 39}, {"type": "magenta_banner", "quantity": 13, "index": 41}]
thought: To craft a stone_axe, I need to place two sticks on top of each other and a blackstone or cobblestone below them. I will start by moving a blackstone from slot 39 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 39 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: stone_axe
inventory=[{"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "oak_wood", "quantity": 26, "index": 20}, {"type": "creeper_spawn_egg", "quantity": 2, "index": 22}, {"type": "cracked_polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 51, "index": 28}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 2, "index": 39}, {"type": "magenta_banner", "quantity": 13, "index": 41}]
thought: Next, I will move another blackstone from slot 39 to slot 2. This will complete the blackstone row.
Ok
act: move from slot 39 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: stone_axe
inventory=[{"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "oak_wood", "quantity": 26, "index": 20}, {"type": "creeper_spawn_egg", "quantity": 2, "index": 22}, {"type": "cracked_polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 51, "index": 28}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "magenta_banner", "quantity": 13, "index": 41}]
thought: I will now move a stick from slot 11 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 39 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: stone_axe
inventory=[{"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "oak_wood", "quantity": 26, "index": 20}, {"type": "creeper_spawn_egg", "quantity": 2, "index": 22}, {"type": "cracked_polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 51, "index": 28}, {"type": "magenta_banner", "quantity": 13, "index": 41}]
thought: Finally, I will move the last stick from slot 12 to slot 5. This will complete the crafting pattern for the stone_axe.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 5 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: stone_axe
inventory=[{"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "oak_wood", "quantity": 26, "index": 20}, {"type": "creeper_spawn_egg", "quantity": 2, "index": 22}, {"type": "cracked_polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 51, "index": 28}, {"type": "magenta_banner", "quantity": 13, "index": 41}]
thought: The crafting pattern is complete, so I will move the stone_axe from slot 0 to slot 8. This will add the stone_axe to my inventory.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 8 with quantity 1

thought: I have successfully crafted the stone_axe and added it to my inventory.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
